sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,TSN ,FACTORY ,SUB_MER_ID ,MER_SYS_ID ,PLAT_MER_ID ,VERSION ,CATEGORY ,CREATE_TIME ,ACTIVE_TIME ,LAST_UPDATE_TIME ,TERMINAL_INFO ,LOGIN_NAME ,LOGIN_PWD ,LAST_LOGIN_TIME ,LAST_LOGIN_INFO ,STATUS ,RESERVED ,AGENT_ID_L1 ,AGENT_ID_L2 FROM SUB_MER_TERMINAL WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_TERMINAL.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(TSN) Like '%'||(#tsn:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FACTORY) Like '%'||(#factory:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(PLAT_MER_ID) =#plat_mer_id#
(VERSION) Like '%'||(#version:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CATEGORY) Like '%'||(#category:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACTIVE_TIME) Like '%'||(#active_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LAST_UPDATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#last_update_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_INFO) Like '%'||(#terminal_info:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOGIN_NAME) Like '%'||(#login_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOGIN_PWD) Like '%'||(#login_pwd:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LAST_LOGIN_TIME) Like '%'||(#last_login_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LAST_LOGIN_INFO) Like '%'||(#last_login_info:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_ID_L1) =#agent_id_l1#
(AGENT_ID_L2) =#agent_id_l2#
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM SUB_MER_TERMINAL WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_TERMINAL.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(TSN) Like '%'||(#tsn:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FACTORY) Like '%'||(#factory:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(PLAT_MER_ID) =#plat_mer_id#
(VERSION) Like '%'||(#version:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CATEGORY) Like '%'||(#category:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACTIVE_TIME) Like '%'||(#active_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LAST_UPDATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#last_update_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_INFO) Like '%'||(#terminal_info:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOGIN_NAME) Like '%'||(#login_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOGIN_PWD) Like '%'||(#login_pwd:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LAST_LOGIN_TIME) Like '%'||(#last_login_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LAST_LOGIN_INFO) Like '%'||(#last_login_info:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_ID_L1) =#agent_id_l1#
(AGENT_ID_L2) =#agent_id_l2#
